structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Marital Status Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of marital status categories including single, married, and other relationship statuses for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Single
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who have never been married or are not currently in a marital relationship.

structure:Code.common:Name: Married
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are currently married and living with their spouse.

structure:Code.common:Name: Widowed, divorced or legally separated
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are widowed, divorced, or legally separated from their previous spouse.
